description:
Arduino command line interface


Changelog
8c798884a fix: gRPC ArchiveSketch now returns AlreadyExists code when archive exists (#3050)
6076d14c1 Add first set of profile commands (#2917)
b53fd99e3 Added gRPC functions to manage libraries in profiles (#3019)

a8423abb5 fix: Interpret local library paths relative to the sketch folder (#3006)
20e315c2f fix(builder): strip UTF-8 BOM from .ino sources before preprocessing (#2983)
